item.title: [Go] mTLS client示例
item.description: 环境 go 1.20 GET请求示例 package main import ( "crypto/tls" "crypto/x509" "io" "log" "net/http" "os" ) func main() { // 加载证书和密钥 cert, err := tls.LoadX509KeyPair("client.crt", "client.key") if err != nil { log.Fatal(err) } // 加载服务器的根证书 caCert, err := os.ReadFile("ca.crt") if err != nil { log.Fatal(err) } caCertPool := x509.NewCertPool() caCertPool.AppendCertsFromPEM(caCert)
